ğŸš€ Quick Start â€‹

bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/eddremonts86/sass-template.git

# Install dependencies
cd sass-template
pnpm install

# Configure environment variables
cp .env.example .env.local

# Start development server
pnpm dev

ğŸ” Authentication with Clerk â€‹

  • User registration and login
  • User profile management
  • Route protection
  • Middleware integration

ğŸŒ Internationalization â€‹

  • Support for multiple languages (EN, ES, DA)
  • Automatic locale-based routing
  • UI component translation
  • Automatic language detection

ğŸ¨ Component System â€‹

  • Reusable components with TypeScript
  • Tailwind CSS integration
  • Customizable themes
  • Built-in accessibility

âš¡ Performance and SEO â€‹

  • Server-side rendering (SSR)
  • Static site generation (SSG)
  • Image optimization
  • Dynamic meta tags
